[ Act No. 2679, March 09, 1917 ]
AN ACT TO APPROPRIATE THE SUM OF TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE PURPOSES OF ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-FIVE HUNDRED AND FORTY-EIGHT, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE IMMUNIZATION OF CATTLE AND CARABAOS TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF RINDERPEST WITHIN THE PHILIPPINE ISLANDS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES."
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. There is hereby appropriated, out of any funds in the Insular Treasury not otherwise appropriated, the sum of two hundred and fifty thousand pesos, to be disbursed under the direction of the Secretary of Agriculture and Natural Resources to carry out the purposes of Act Numbered Twenty-five hundred and forty-eight, entitled "An Act to provide for the immunization of cattle and carabaos to prevent the spread of rinderpest within the Philippine Islands, appropriating funds therefor, and for other purposes.ℒαwρhi৷"
Section 2. Provided, further, That whenever the necessities of the, service require it and there remains an unexpended balance of the funds appropriated by this Act, the Secretary of Agriculture and Natural Resources may extend the contract period until such funds shall have been totally disbursed.
Section 3. The Secretary of Agriculture and Natural Resources shall submit a detailed report of the disbursements made under this Act to the Philippine Legislature before October thirtieth of each year, unless the funds herein appropriated shall be entirely disbursed, in which case he shall submit a final report of the disbursements made as well as the results obtained.
Section 4. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, March 9, 1917.
